name: DigitalAccessScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Digital Access Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Digital Access as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: Do children in this household have access to the internet during the day to support learning
Type of internet available to children in household to support learning
Devices used in household to access the internet for learning
Number of laptops or desktops used in household for learning
Number of tablets used in household for learning
Number of smartphones used in household use for learning
